entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS

SOUTHEAST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
